mainPrompt: I am going to provide you a large document broken up into smaller pieces, sent to you one message at a time. Each line will be prepended with a message letting you know when the document begins and appended with a message letting you know when the document ends. Please only repond with the word: "Confirmed."
messagePrepend: Here is the next portion. (Document beings here)
messageAppend: (Document ends here) Respond to this message with only the word: "Confirmed."
